attributes.action: Make it illegal to park across a drop kerb
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present if you leave your drive anyone can park in front of it. We pay the council a lot of money to have them put in, only to find there is no law to protect us. As it stands it is only illegal to park across a drive if there is a car etc parked there, we want it so that it is illegal, "all the time" so we can park when we come home.
